subject: Short Track Skating
lead_paragraph: Canada’s Charles Hamelin won the 500-meter title at the short-track speedskating world championships, while the defending champion Apolo Anton Ohno failed to make the final at Ferry Dusika Stadium.
snippet: Canada’s Charles Hamelin won the 500-meter title at the short-track speedskating world championships, while the defending champion Apolo Anton Ohno failed to make the final at Ferry Dusika Stadium.
